title: Head of a Man from a Statuette
description:
Black steatite head of a man from a statuette. Face modeled in Hellenistic style with short, full mouth, furrows in forehead eyes originally inlaid. Short, full hair with narrow band or diadem, long neck. A portrait and of fine quality. 
Condition: Preserved portion intact. Inlays of eyes lost.
dimensions: Accession Cards: Measurements: Height 4.8 cm., width 3.1 cm.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
